import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../styles/formproduct.css"; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; export default function Formproduct() { // Example product data const products = [ {id: "1" , title: "Cerisier", price: 2.99, note : 5, image: "produit1.jpg", }, {id: "2" , title: "Coulis Caramel", price: 13.99, note : 3, image: "produit2.jpg", }, { id: "3" , title: "Douceur exotique", price: 4.99, note : 4, image: "produit3.jpg", }, {id: "4", title: "Blanc Passion", price: 5.99, note: 5, image: "produit4.jpg" }, { id: "6" , title: "Le Zèbre", price: 19.99, note : 4, image: "produit6.jpg" }, {id: "7" , title: "Coulis Fraise", price: 9.99, note : 4, image: "produit7.jpg", }, {id: "8" , title: "Noir Passion", price: 4.99, note : 5, image: "produit8.jpg", }, { id: "9" , title: "Fantaisie", price: 2.99, note : 5, image: "produit9.jpg",}, {id: "10" , title: "Caramel Salé", price: 14.99, note : 4, image: "produit10.jpg"}, ]; const [filteredProducts, setFilteredProducts] = useState(products); const filterProducts = (image) => { const filtered = products.filter(product => product.image === image); setFilteredProducts(filtered); } const [showFilter, setShowFilter] = useState(true); const toggleFilterDisplay = () => { setShowFilter(!showFilter); }; return ( <>
